Q: Today is Christmas Eve of 1937. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/14/2026
(B) 12/14/1950
(C) 12/14/2007
(D) 12/14/1937
(E) 07/14/1938
(F) 12/14/1988
A: (D)

Q: Tomorrow is 11/12/2019. What is the date one year ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 09/04/2018
(B) 11/11/2018
(C) 08/25/2018
(D) 11/02/2018
(E) 11/04/2018
A: (B)

Q: Jane and John married on Jan 2, 1958. It is their 5-year anniversary today. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/11/1961
(B) 01/03/1963
(C) 01/18/1961
(D) 10/14/1960
(E) 01/03/1982
(F) 12/03/1960
A: (B)

(E) 07/09/2007
(F) 09/04/1972

Q: The target grid has a pattern where the first and last rows are identical, with Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth columns. The second and fourth rows have Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth columns, while the third row has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth columns. The second and fourth columns of the second and fourth rows are empty. The third row has an X in the third column. The first and last rows have an X in the third column. The second and fourth rows have an X in the third column. The second and fourth columns of the second and fourth rows are empty.
Answer: third||
